titleStmt.title: An Encoded Transcription of Material from the Sylvia Beach Papers

msIdentifier.repository: Princeton University. Library. Dept. of Rare Books and Special Collections

body.ab:
1940 LAMIRAULT to Nov 22 1940 Renewal 1v, 3m S 50 frs changed to 2 vols Aug 22 Dusty Answer 2 mos 1/2 Aug 24 Aug 29 Green's History of England Sept 9 Sept 9 English Traits Sept 26 9 Kim Sept 26 26 Spectator. Oct 10 Renewed - September 19 - October 19 S 20
Sept 26 America as Americans See It Oct 10 Oct 10 Something of Myself Nov 4 10 Short Life of shakespeare Oct 21 21 Tess of the D'Urbervilles Nov 20 4 Origins of Empire Nov 20 Renewal Nov 22 - Feb 22 3m 2v S 70 Nov 20 New Machiavelli Dec 16 20 English Constitution W.C. Dec 16 Dec 16 Church of England Jan 6 16 Citadel Jan 6 Jan 6 Evolution of Industry Jan. 13 6 Martin Arrowsmith Jan 16 13 Starting Point Jan 27 16 Parliament (Ilbert) Feb 6 27 East Wind: West Wind Feb 6 Feb 6 My American Feb 24 6 Sketchbook Feb 24 24 Ordeal in England Renewed Feb 22nd - May 22nd 1941 1 v S 50 pd Feb 24 (refunded 50v 1 of 2 deposits) ref 50 2nd dep Mar 13 Far from the maddening crowd March 31 March 31 Lord Jim April 21
1939 LAMIRAULT Raymonde 4 av. Courteline Parix XII
1m 1 vol. S. ? 20 Dep. 50 dep pd Sept 26 50 total 100 Dec. 1 Vicar of Wakefield Feb 22 1941 Dec 9 refunded 1 dep 50v dep now 50 frs Dec 9 Visit to America, Macdonnell Dec 21 21 Man of Property Jan 4 21 Lost Horizon no extra charge Jan 4 for holidays
Renewed Jan 2 1940 - April 2 1940 50 Jan. 4 Good-Bye, Mr Chips Jan. 8 8 English journey Jan. 22 22 Constant Nymph Feb. 1 Feb. 1 Shaws Plays Pleasant + Unpleasant Feb 14 14 Angel Pavements March 4 March 4 Together & Apart March 20 March 20 Third Act in Venice April 8 20 Lamb in his Bosom (no charge) April 5 Renewed April 2 1940 - May 2 1940. 1m. 1 vol S 20
April 8 Good earth April 22 22 Rains Came May 6th May 6 Invitation to the Waltz May 20 ren. May 21 1940 - June 21 1940 1m 1 vol S. 20 May 20 My Antonia June 3 left deposit 50v
LAMIRAULT to May 22 Mlle Raymonde, 4 Ave Courteline - XII April 21 Antic Hay May 5 5 Back Sheet May 16 16 Mill on the Floss. Silas Marner May 29 Will renew later Dep ref 50. July 24
